name: contrary
effect: Whenever this Pokémon's stats would be raised, they are instead lowered by the same amount, and vice versa.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
Makes stat changes have
an opposite effect.

Makes stat changes have
an opposite effect.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
flavor_text_entries.scarlet-violet: Reverses any stat changes affecting the Pokémon so that attempts to boost its stats instead lower them—and attempts to lower its stats will boost them.
